name: Zoo Cache
description:
Zoo Cache is a competitive 1-4 player memorization game where only 1 person wins the zoo. The first player to have 20 points, having guessed the locations of 20 animals, wins the game (Players can decide to lower the win requirement.) Choose to swap the cards on the map, deny actions, or force other players to guess the locations of animals. It's up to you how to advance in the game. 

https://playingcards.io/gf3e6
